meanings.definition: A type of pasta dish originating from Italy.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat ita with tomato sauce.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant serves delicious ita with cheese.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone enjoyed the ita with garlic bread.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the ita filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The ita was perfectly al dente, a true delight.

meanings.definition: A suffix used in medical terminology to indicate inflammation.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with bronch-ita.
meanings.sent2: The suffix -ita is commonly used in medical reports.
meanings.sent3: The nurse explained the meaning of -ita to the confused patient.
meanings.sent4: The -ita in the test results indicated a possible infection.
meanings.sent5: The presence of -ita in the blood test raised concerns.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional Japanese roof.
meanings.sent1: The temple's ita was beautifully crafted with wooden tiles.
meanings.sent2: The ita of the house provided excellent insulation.
meanings.sent3: During the storm, the ita protected the building from rain.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight filtered through the ita, creating a warm glow.
meanings.sent5: The sound of rain on the ita was soothing and calming.
